name: Henri Dès: Les Bêtises
overview: Henri Dès: Les bêtises is a children's title featuring multiple fun activities. Primarily the game features 12 songs by French singer-songwriter Henri Dès. Each song is fully illustrated and accompanied by its lyrics to aid in singing along. There are dozens of games to play for the whole family, which are accompanied by the songs. Additionally the game features a number of dessert recipes.
